item_town_notice.name: Town Notice
item_town_notice.description: A notice posted on the town bulletin board. It reads: 'MISSING: Supplies from the last merchant caravan. Anyone with information please speak to the Town Elder.'

item_traveler_journal.name: Traveler's Journal
item_traveler_journal.description: A leather-bound journal with entries from a merchant who passed through the village. The last entry mentions strange noises in the forest at night and missing supplies.

item_fishing_net.name: Fishing Net
item_fishing_net.description: A sturdy net used for catching fish.

item_barrel_ale.name: Barrel of Ale
item_barrel_ale.description: A large wooden barrel, full of the Drunken Dragon's signature ale.

item_torn_map.name: Torn Map
item_torn_map.description: A torn piece of parchment showing a partial map of the region. There appears to be a marked location deep in the forest, but part of the map is missing.

item_waterlogged_pouch.name: Waterlogged Pouch
item_waterlogged_pouch.description: A small leather pouch, soaked through but seemingly intact. Perhaps something valuable remains inside.

item_burnt_scroll.name: Burnt Scroll
item_burnt_scroll.description: A fragile scroll, mostly destroyed by fire and time. Only a few cryptic symbols remain legible.

item_summit_offering.name: Weathered Offering
item_summit_offering.description: A small, carved stone left at the shrine long ago. It feels strangely peaceful to hold.

item_sharp_flint.name: Sharp Flint
item_sharp_flint.description: A piece of flint with a naturally sharp edge. Could be used as a makeshift tool or weapon.

item_driftwood.name: Piece of Driftwood
item_driftwood.description: A smooth piece of wood, worn by the sea and sand.

item_coiled_rope.name: Coiled Rope
item_coiled_rope.description: A length of sturdy hemp rope, coiled neatly.
